definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Usually the box-type resistance furnace vault is unqualified to place the resistance alloy.
sentences.chinese: 箱式电阻炉炉顶通常不配置电阻丝。

sentences.english: Bialetti is THE world-renowned manufacturer of Italian stovetop espresso makers.
sentences.chinese: 比亚莱蒂是意大利炉顶咖啡制造商的世界知名制造商。

sentences.english: This paper sums up the experi-ces to improve the cleaning zone roof structure in cold maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 本文就此次冷修对贫化炉区炉顶结构改进做一总结。

sentences.english: The research of the application of continuous analysis technique in blast furnace top comprehensive gas has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了攀钢高炉炉顶综合煤气连续分析技术应用研究。

sentences.english: The furnace top underlining construction is important characteristic of hot air furnace.
sentences.chinese: 炉顶内衬结构是热风炉类型的重要特征。

sentences.english: The furnace top underlining and refractory building method are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 总结目前热风炉炉顶内衬结构及其耐材砌筑方式。

sentences.english: My browning of the brussels sprouts on the stovetop was shorter than that.
sentences.chinese: 我的炉顶的褐色芽甘蓝加热时间短于这个时间。

sentences.english: Grab a wash cloth and wipe down the kitchen counters, stove top and table.
sentences.chinese: 拿块抹布把厨房角落，炉顶和桌子擦干净。

sentences.english: Then you cook food on hot stones placed on top of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 先在炉底生起烈火，再于炉顶的热石上烹调食物。

sentences.english: Or make it have a reverberatory furnace of molten pool, installing electric heating body on top.
sentences.chinese: 或做成有熔池的反射炉，在炉顶上装设电热体。

sentences.english: Third, may replace the pressure relief valve in the blast furnace system group to adjust the stable furnace top pressure.
sentences.chinese: 可以代替高炉系统中减压阀组调节稳定炉顶压力。

definition: a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
